705513f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lott Street - Erasmus Street
705513f-a.text:
LLott .3t., at the S.E. corner of Erasmus Street. In the background, is
seen the steeple of the Holy Cross (R.C.) Church, on Erasmus Street.
March 29, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
705513f-a.folder: Lott Street & Erasmus Street, Brooklyn, NY
